body: So if i understand correctly, for CUDA types, it is okay if `.clone()` is async (and in fact is preferred); for CPU types, there is no such thing as async copy. And `clone()` doesn't do cross device copy.... maybe we should just set to `true` here? Correct me if I'm wrong though.
